channel.title: SkyLearn Filter Test Feed – 10 Articles
channel.description: Mixed commercial property and general news articles for Zapier filter validation

item.title: BT relocates London headquarters to Aldgate Tower
item.description: BT Group has moved its HQ offices to a new 300,000 sq ft building in Aldgate Tower.

item.title: WeWork expands office footprint across Manchester
item.description: The flexible workspace giant adds two new sites totalling 120,000 sq ft.

item.title: Legal General signs major lease in Leeds city centre
item.description: The investment firm has leased 50,000 sq ft at Wellington Place.

item.title: PwC plans relocation to new HQ in Birmingham
item.description: The Big Four firm will occupy a 200,000 sq ft workspace near Paradise Circus.

item.title: Capita announces office expansion in Glasgow
item.description: Capita is expanding its Scottish HQ to accommodate 400 staff.

item.title: UK inflation eases slightly in September
item.description: Economists say the Bank of England may pause rate hikes as prices stabilise.

item.title: Premier League club confirms new sponsorship deal
item.description: The three-year partnership will feature shirt branding and stadium adverts.

item.title: BBC announces new drama series set in Cornwall
item.description: The show follows a local family and their fishing business.

item.title: Greggs to open 50 more bakeries across the UK
item.description: The retailer plans new shops in retail parks and transport hubs.

item.title: Government announces £2bn green investment fund
item.description: The initiative aims to support renewable energy projects nationwide.
